system.description:
All mentalists flirt with psionic ability as they hone their mind alongside their body. Some take it a step further, developing real psionic power as well, blending it seamlessly with their more physical disciplines.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your Intelligence score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with the Awakened Mind combat tradition in addition to any others you are proficient in, and immediately learn one Awakened Mind maneuver of your choice.  You may add your esper level to your adept level to determine the maximum degree of maneuver you may learn, but only for Awakend Mind maneuvers.
  • You may expend a psi die and roll it, regaining exertion equal to the roll.  Once you have done so, you may not do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
